ygData.msgSnippet: I tried Pottery and it is very easier to raise but at the moment i only have make small jar which sell for less than 1 gp which is a loss. But if the Pie tin
ygData.messageBody:
I tried Pottery and it is very easier to raise but at the moment i only have make small jar
which sell for less than 1 gp which is a loss.

But if the Pie tin sell for 5gp like what the forum say, there might be profit to be make
at higher lvl of pottery.

Eriz
